alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Dauphin (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 1:16AM EDT until July 25 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Cumberland County in south central Pennsylvania... Southern Dauphin County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 200 AM EDT. * At 115 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Enola, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Harrisburg, Lower Allen, Hershey, Colonial Park, Progress, Camp Hill, Palmyra, New Cumberland, Linglestown, Enola, Steelton and Lemoyne. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 81 from mile markers 60 to 81. Interstate 83 from mile markers 41 to 50. Interstate 283 from mile markers 1 to 2. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Very heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
